faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Real Estate Agents in Sector 79 Noida

faqs.question: What fees should I expect when hiring real estate agents in Sector 79 Noida
faqs.answer: Standard real estate agent commission in Sector 79 typically ranges between 1% and 2% of the total property value for both the buyer and the seller though this is negotiable depending on the property type complexity and value. For rentals the fee is usually equivalent to one month's rent shared between the owner and the tenant. We maintain a transparent fee structure ensuring you know all costs associated with our services upfront before any commitment is made.

faqs.question: How do you verify the legal status of properties in Sector 79
faqs.answer: Legal verification is a foundational step in our service process. Our team conducts extensive due diligence including checking the RERA registration status developer solvency title deed clarity mutation records and ensuring all relevant NOCs No Objection Certificates are secured. We work closely with legal counsel to provide a detailed title verification report minimizing any risk of future litigation for our clients.
